medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain and constipation for 48 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 48 hours ago, beginning diffusely in the abdomen and epigastric area, now focused in the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The pain is associated with nausea but no vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prostate cancer diagnosed recently but never treated per patient preference; right ankle surgery; right inguinal hernia repair.
